info.title: Kuali Rice ${pom.version} Release Notes

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: This Release Notes documentation includes information on the list of changes between Rice ${previous.version} (released ${previous.reldate}) and Rice ${pom.version}.
If you encounter any difficulty, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact the Rice team on our public collaboration mailing list at rice.collab@kuali.org
Kuali Rice ${pom.version} can be downloaded from the Rice website at http://kuali.org/rice/download.
There are three differient distributions of Rice available: source, binary and server. Please read the Installation Guide for more details on each of these distributions.
Documentation for this release can be found at at http://kuali.org/rice/docs/${pom.version}.

sect2.title: Bug Fix

KULRICE-5078: MultiLookup Export functionality failing for pages spilling beyond a certain size

sect2.title: Improvement
sect2.para: KULRICE-5010: Improve performance for RoleManagementServiceImpl.removePrincipalFromRole

KULRICE-5034: CXF SOAP service logging does not honor log4j.properties
KULRICE-5072: 1.0.3.2 fixes for Tomcat 7 support

KULRICE-5101: Improve messaging for simultaneous workflow actions
KULRICE-5114: Allow config.xml files to include HTTPSessionListeners
KULRICE-5173: Making immutable properties on startup results in an excessive amount of copying

KULRICE-5028: Apply improvements from KS' perf branch of Rice to 1.0.3.2

KULRICE-5088: Need to be able to retrieve States based on Alternate Country Code
KULRICE-5144: Create test for multiple attachments

sect1.title: Upgrade Guide: Rice 1.0.3.1 to 1.0.3.2
sect1.para: Please Note: We recommend backing up any data in your database prior to performing an upgrade!

sect3.title: Oracle Rice Database
sect3.para: Please execute the update_final_oracle.sql upgrade script from the scripts/upgrades/1.0.3.1 to 1.0.3.2/final directory.

sect3.title: MySQL Rice Database
sect3.para: Please execute the update_final_mysql.sql upgrade script from the scripts/upgrades/1.0.3.1 to 1.0.3.2/final directory.

sect2.title: Upgrading the Client Database
sect2.para: There are no client database upgrades required.

sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: There are no dependency changes for this release.

sect1.title: Impacting Changes
sect1.para: There are no impacting changes for this release.
